title: Sam and Rob make sweaters and blankets

content.question: Suppose that in one week Sam can knit 5 sweaters or make 4 blankets and Rob can knit 10 sweaters or make 6 blankets. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: Sam has an absolute advantage in making blankets.
Sam has an absolute advantage in knitting sweaters.
Sam has a comparative advantage in making blankets.
Sam has a comparative advantage in knitting sweaters.
Sam has neither a comparative nor an absolute advantage in knitting sweaters or making blankets.

content.answer: Sam has a comparative advantage in making blankets.
